PC.translation[0].definitions[0].definit: a computer that is used by one person at a time, either at home or at work
PC.translation[0].definitions[0].example: People can use their PCs to do their banking from home.
PC.translation[0].definitions[1].definit: a police officer of the lowest rank
PC.translation[1].definitions[0].definit: used to describe language, behaviour, and attitudes that are carefully chosen so that they do not offend or insult anyone
PC.translation[1].definitions[0].example: It’s not PC to describe people as disabled.
PC.translation[2].definitions[0].definit: personal computer; a small computer that can be used by one person, or connected to a NETWORK
PC.translation[2].definitions[0].example: Although US companies dominate the world PC business, they have less than 10% of the Japanese market.
PC.translation[2].definitions[1].example: The country’s overall industrial production fell by 0.3 pc during the last month.
